description: This is an easy trail along the lakeshore, with nice views of the lower lake and surrounding Rocky Mountains.The 1.5km Marsh Loop is at the South end of the trail and (at least today in Winter) was a very nice addition to the walk.NTS Map: 082J11Elevation Gain: 30 m (98 ft)
directions: Park at the Lower Lake day use area and follow the trail as far as you want. Return the same way.Alternately you can start from the Canyon parking area and walk the trail from N to South and back.  The trailhead is at the East edge of the parking lot.
title: Lower Kananaskis Lake Trail and Marsh Loop - Peter Lougheed PP
